: not what you are looking for

if you want to be sure that nothing blocks your card you can switch to a terminal , sudo /etc/init.d/gdm stop (if you want your xserver back restart it with sudo /etc...gdm restart) then try to mpg321 filename, if you need irc you can use bitchx
